title: Monetization
content:
Im sorry, i would to ask about monetization, i waiting 4 month for monetization, my youtube channel already have more 1k subsribers and 4k wacth time, my youtube channel has met all requirements and never violated the rule at all, but why until now monetization review on my channel has not been recevied yet, no rejection email or email has been received by my channel monetization, it's take a long time . Please review my channel.
